description: Perform operations on soft-deleted backup instances.

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-instance deleted-backup-instance list
commands.summary: List deleted backup instances belonging to a backup vault.

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-instance deleted-backup-instance show
commands.summary: Get a deleted backup instance with name in a backup vault.

commands.name: az dataprotection backup-instance deleted-backup-instance undelete
commands.syntax:
az dataprotection backup-instance deleted-backup-instance undelete [--backup-instance-name]
                                                                   [--ids]
                                                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                                   [--subscription]
                                                                   [--vault-name]
